resources.string: Press back once more to exit!
The system killed the application process in the background! Add the application to system optimizer exceptions! For more information, visit https://dontkillmyapp.com
do not change the target API

It looks like you have MIUI! I recommend opening developer settings and disabling MIUI optimization. If you do not do this, you may have problems with the operation of the application, errors and crashes. Please do not write to me about program errors if you read this message and did not follow my advice!
Now you know there\'s a menu here!
Wait for the end of the running process!

For Android 13+, a special permission needs to be granted to enable the accessibility service. To do this, open the system information about the application and in the menu at the top (three dots) give permission. This menu may not appear until you click on the accessibility service.

Comma separated list of the screen densities that the APK will be optimized for. All the resources that would be unused on devices of the given densities will be removed from the APK.
Comma separated list of configurations to include. The default is all configurations.

The setting file (pk8 file or keystore file). If it is a pk8 file, will automatically generate an x509.pem file with the same name (for example, testkey.pk8 corresponds to testkey.x509.pem).

The characters allowed are Latin letters \"A-Z\", numbers \"0-9\", the hyphen \"-\" and the underscore character \"_\". All other characters will be replaced by the underscore character.

To replace spaces in the templates \"LABEL\", \"DEFAULT_LABEL\", \"VERSION\", as well as separators in the templates \"ARCH\", \"DATE\" and \"TIME\", for example, with the underscore \"_\", use the following format: {LABEL_}, {DEFAULT_LABEL_}, {VERSION_}, {ARCH_}, {DATE_}, {TIME_}. The value can be arbitrary.

You need to download the aapt/aapt2 files! You can download them now or do it later in the settings. An Internet connection is required to download.\n\nDo you want to download now?

The built-in aapt/aapt2 binaries may not be compatible with your system. You can update them now or do it later in the settings. An Internet connection is required to download.\n\nDo you want to download now?

The UnApkm plugin is signed by someone else\'s signature. Probably the plugin has been modified. It is highly recommended that you remove the plugin and download the original file from the developer\'s site. By clicking \"Not remind\" you continue to use the modified plugin at your own peril and risk!
MPatcher — program for running shell scripts
Please describe briefly your actions after which the error occurred

For the program to work in the background (when it is minimized), it is advisable to add it to the exceptions of the system optimizer. The application will only run in the background if you run it yourself!\n\nDo you want to do this?

To fix the OOM error, increase the size of the heap memory.

To increase the size of the heap memory, you need root privileges!

You need to open the file /system/build.prop and add/change the line in it dalvik.vm.heapsize = 512m (512m is the heap size in megabytes).

This operation can be done using Apktool M only if the /system partition will be remounted with write permission, otherwise you need to use other tools.

Sometimes there are two such lines in the file, one of them needs to be deleted.
Want to restore your settings? The current settings will be overwritten!
Android 11 introduce a new file-management way called \"Scoped Storage\". You need to grant a special permission!

{NAME} - original file name without extension.
{EXT} - original file extension.
{DATE} - date in "%1$s" format.
{TIME} - time in "%2$s" format.
{0} - number starting from "0".
Send a log to the developer
